properties.help: Size of connection tracking expect table

valueHelp.description: Number of entries allowed in connection tracking expect table

properties.help: Hash size for connection tracking table

valueHelp.description: Size of hash to use for connection tracking table

properties.help: Customized rules to ignore selective connection tracking

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Ignore rule number must be between 1 and 999999

valueHelp.description: Match everything except the specified address
Match everything except the specified prefix
Match everything except the specified range
Named port (any name in /etc/services, e.g., http)

Multiple destination ports can be specified as a comma-separated list.
The whole list can also be negated using '!'.
For example: '!22,telnet,http,123,1001-1005'

properties.help: Interface to ignore connections tracking on
Protocol to match (protocol name, number, or "all")

Multiple destination ports can be specified as a comma-separated list.
The whole list can also be negated using '!'.
For example: '!22,telnet,http,123,1001-1005'

valueHelp.description: Allow tracking of previously established connections
